docs.text: Stochastic Optimization 🔗 Home Github repository Syllabus 🔗 This class covers stochastic methods of optimization, primarily simulated annealing, evolutionary strategies, and genetic algorithms. The class is 10 hours total and uses HTML presentations and Jupyter notebooks in Python for exercises. The evaluation for this class will be based on presenting an article on a stochastic algorithm in teams of 3. Schedule 04/11 Introduction and simulated annealing Continuous optimization, random search, simulated annealing 10/11 Evolutionary Strategies Population-based methods, 1+1 EA, CMA-ES, Natural ES 17/11 Genetic Algorithms Genetic Algorithm, Multi-Objective Optimization, NSGA-II 25/11 Project Project presentations
docs.title: Home
